backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining pricing plans, user profiles, site settings, admin authorization, and storage, including CRUD operations and admin-gated actions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and tests with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for all major frontend files, including components, hooks, and admin panels.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color systems and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script loading the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: UI overlay showing context-aware admin access denial messaging with close action.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Unified admin interface with tabs for pricing, content customization, logo management, and admin management.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminsAdmi: UI for listing, adding, removing, and copying admin principals with mutation and identity hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSetup: Dialog allowing first-time admin setup with claim logic, success feedback, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/LogoAdminP: Allows uploading and previewing a new site logo with validation, progress tracking, and backend update.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingPla: Interface to create, edit, validate, and delete pricing plans using backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteCustom: Form-based editor for site content settings with loading, saving, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Renders site footer with dynamic logo, settings-driven text, navigation links, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/landing/Header.t: Landing page header with logo, navigation, authentication handling, admin checks, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Hero section displaying dynamic titles, CTAs, background imagery, and feature badges with scroll-based animations.
frontend/src/components/landing/ScrollRe: Utility component that reveals children with fade-and-slide animations when entering the viewport.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sections: Contains Stats, Features, and Pricing sections using site copy and backend data, each rendered with animations and UI components.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting newly authenticated users without a profile to submit their name and save it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Dialog allowing users to view and update their profile name with validation and success feedback.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Static content definitions for navigation, hero, stats, features, pricing, and FAQ used throughout the landing page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, loading identities, handling login/logout, and providing context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin checks, admin management, and backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query configuration.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the landing page layout and conditionally shows admin panel access based on identity and admin status.
frontend/src/utils/siteSettings.ts: Merges backend site settings with default frontend copy to produce final UI configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, feature requirements, issues, and architectural notes for building the customizable 'tripple host' website with admin and user authentication.
